description:
Add persistent visual feedback showing when forms auto-save, last saved timestamp, and handle network failures gracefully. Include recovery UI if user loses connection mid-documentation.

**Rationale:** Long anamnesis forms risk data loss if browser crashes or network drops. Users need confidence their work is saved, especially during 20+ minute consultations with complex medical histories.
title: Auto-save indicators with conflict resolution UI
